import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import downarrw from '../icons/arrow-down.png' export default function DropMenu(props ){ const title=props.role? props.role:'Select Role' const [dropmenu,setshow]=useState(false) function roleDrop(){ setshow(!dropmenu) } return(
{title}
{dropmenu &&
  • ios Developer
  • Android Developer
  • Full Stack Developer
  • Front-end Developer
  • Back-end Developer
}
) }
